summary: Utility module that determines the server environment, maps configuration strings to authorization manager types, and initializes the appropriate authentication and security managers for a Feast server, leveraging token extraction and parsing components.
business_intent: Facilitate the setup of access control mechanisms in Feast deployments by configuring the correct auth manager (e.g., allowâ€‘all, OIDC) and security manager based on runtime settings, ensuring that requests are properly authenticated and authorized.
